ABOUT_US.TITLE: About Oryx Bio: A Committed Brand
ABOUT_US.DESCRIPTION: Welcome to Oryx Bio, a Tunisian brand of natural cosmetics born from a passion for beauty, nature, and well-being. I’m George, the founder and developer of this platform, driven by the desire to create an authentic experience around natural skincare. Oryx Bio is not just an online store; it’s a reflection of personal commitment to more responsible and healthier beauty.

MISSION.TITLE: Our Mission
MISSION.DESCRIPTION: Oryx Bio was created with the goal of promoting a more natural approach to cosmetics by combining tradition, innovation, and respect for the environment. My mission is simple: to offer quality products inspired by ancestral rituals, while showcasing Tunisian expertise and the benefits of natural ingredients.

VISION.TITLE: Our Vision
VISION.DESCRIPTION: Unlike major brands driven by profit, Oryx Bio’s vision is built on authenticity, sustainability, and positive impact. I see Oryx Bio as a showcase of what nature has best to offer, while valuing local heritage. Through this initiative, I aim to inspire more conscious and respectful consumption.

UNIQUENESS.TITLE: What Makes Oryx Bio Unique
FEATURES: Artisanal approach: Each Oryx Bio product is carefully crafted, using natural ingredients and gentle processes that are kind to the skin and the planet.
Local commitment: We work with local producers to support the Tunisian economy and ensure the freshness and quality of our raw materials.
Transparency and ethics: At Oryx Bio, we believe in honest communication. All our products are clearly described, without false promises.
Continuous improvement: Every piece of feedback helps us grow. We continuously refine our formulas and services to offer the best of nature.

GET_INVOLVED.TITLE: Get Involved
GET_INVOLVED.DESCRIPTION: Want to support Oryx Bio? There are several ways to participate:
OPPORTUNITIES: Share your feedback: Your insights are essential to improve our products and your overall experience. We welcome your suggestions.
Spread the word: Help raise awareness of Oryx Bio in your community or on social media to promote a more natural beauty.
Contribute: Are you passionate about natural living, cosmetics, or sustainability? Join us and be part of the Oryx Bio journey!

CONTACT_US.TITLE: Contact Us
CONTACT_US.DESCRIPTION: Got a technical issue? Want to send feedback about a beta feature? Need details about our Business plan? Let us know.
